message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. While I believe it has its merits, I want to be transparent and let you know that I wouldn't call it our top-of-the-line offering. That being said, it still has value and might be a good fit for your needs. The price is $10000. I'll let you decide if it's right for you.
Thank you for your transparency, Alice. Based on your description, I am willing to proceed with the purchase. Let's go ahead with the transaction.
